meaningMnemonic: Causing <radical>death</radical> at every turn, the <radical>moon</radical> <radical>king</radical> sits inside his moon, getting ready to cause death on anything in his sights. Sounds a lot like the Death Star from a certain movie. One of which is "Star Wars: A New <kanji>Hope</kanji>."
readingMnemonic: The name A New <kanji>Hope</kanji>, as we all know, comes from the ending where the moon king's son sends a <reading>bow</reading>ling (ぼう) ball into that little opening and knocks it out of the sky.
